de.muspellheim.commons.util

Class EventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.muspellheim.commons.util.EventBus

  • public class EventBus
extends Object
    Simple event bus implementation.

    Subscribe and publish events. Events are published in channels distinguished by event type. Channels can be grouped using an event type hierarchy.

    You can use the default event bus instance getDefault(), which is a singleton or you can create one or multiple instances of EventBus.

    Example: 

    
 EventBus bus = EventBus.getDefault();
 bus.subscribe(String.class, e -> System.out.println(e));
 bus.subscribe(Integer.class, e -> System.out.println(e));

 bus.publish("Foo");
 bus.publish(42);

      • getDefault

        public static EventBus getDefault()
        Get the default event bus, can be used as application wide singleton.
        Returns:
        the only instance of the default event bus.

      • subscribe

        public <T> void subscribe(@NonNull
                          @NonNull Class<? extends T> eventType,
                          @NonNull
                          @NonNull Consumer<T> subscriber)
        Subscribe to an event type
        Type Parameters:
        T - the event type class.
        Parameters:
        eventType - the event type, can be a super class of all events to subscribe.
        subscriber - the subscriber which will consume the events.

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(@NonNull
                        @NonNull Consumer<?> subscriber)
        Unsubscribe from all event types.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - the subscriber to unsubscribe.

      • unsubscribe

        public <T> void unsubscribe(@NonNull
                            @NonNull Class<? extends T> eventType,
                            @NonNull
                            @NonNull Consumer<T> subscriber)
        Unsubscribe from an event type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the event type class.
        Parameters:
        eventType - the event type, can be a super class of all events to unsubscribe.
        subscriber - the subscriber to unsubscribe.

      • publish

        public void publish(@NonNull
                    @NonNull Object event)
        Publish an event to all subscribers.

        The event type is the class of event. The event is published to all consumers which subscribed to this event type or any super class.

        Parameters:
        event - the event.
